methods.name: freq()
methods.desc: Set the frequency of the oscillator in Hz.

methods.name: amp()
methods.desc: Change the amplitude/volume of this sound.

methods.name: add()
methods.desc: Offset the output of this generator by given value

methods.name: pan()
methods.desc: Move the sound in a stereo panorama.

description: This is a simple triangle (or "saw") wave oscillator
